Interface Hitbox

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollisionComponent
public interface Hitbox
The Hitbox interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class representing an object with a rectangular hitbox. It provides methods to retrieve the x and y coordinates, width, and height of the hitbox.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getHitboxHeight()
    Gets the height of the hitbox.
    double
    getHitboxWidth()
    Gets the width of the hitbox.
    double
    getHitboxX()
    Gets the x-coordinate of the hitbox.
    double
    getHitboxY()
    Gets the y-coordinate of the hitbox.
